title: Microplastics: What are they and what can we do about them?
body: By Michael Rennie on May 10, 2017 You've seen the headlines. In fact, it seems like everyday we are exposed to articles about how plastic pollution is affecting our environment and water supplies—microplastics in particular. Recently, Canada and the United States took action to remove microplastics from cosmetic products and scrubs.
